message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $115.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can work within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $105?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I still feel there's room for a better deal. Could we agree on $107 for the product?
